response.name: Kettlebell Swing
response.description: A dynamic power exercise that works the posterior chain, glutes, and hamstrings using a kettlebell.

response.name: Goblet Squat
response.description: A lower-body strength exercise holding a kettlebell at chest height to improve squat form and core stability.

response.name: Turkish Get-Up
response.description: A full-body movement that combines core engagement, mobility, and strength using a kettlebell.

response.name: Kettlebell Clean and Press
response.description: Builds explosive strength by transitioning the kettlebell from swing to rack position and pressing overhead.

response.name: Kettlebell Deadlift
response.description: Targets the posterior chain and core with controlled hip-hinging using a kettlebell.
